name: Dead Zone (itch)
description:
Dead zone is zombie survival based game with buy able weapons and gear around the map. Your goal is to see how many waves you can get before the zombies overpower you. Zombies get faster each round and gain more health. Make sure you are saving up your money or the larger zombies might get you first...

This is just a demo of the game so many of the features are locked for the full release.

The full release will contain:

  •  More survival maps
  • More weapons
  • More different kind of zombies
  • A campaign
  • Multiplayer

And much more.
